title: Introduction
description: Welcome to the Psyduck bot! This is simply a pet project of mine but it has decently fleshed out systems. The following pages will show you the basic features of the bot.

title: Leveling Tutorial
description: You gain random amounts of XP from running commands. After obtaining 100 XP, you level up. Each level provides additional rewards, detailed below. The maximum level is 100. You can view your levels via /profile.

fields.name: Fishing
fields.value: Decreases the chance of your fishing rod breaking

fields.name: Gathering
fields.value: Increases the chance of getting rare items

fields.name: Hunting
fields.value: Increases the chance of getting rare items and decreases the chance of your rifle breaking

fields.name: Chopping
fields.value: Increases the amount of logs you get from each chop

fields.name: Trading
fields.value: Increases the sell value of goods

title: Combat Tutorial
description: After obtaining enough materials, you are able to craft (or buy) weapons and armor. These can be equiped using /equip and are viewed on your profile. There are three main stats that impact combat, which are detailed below. Your stats also increase with each level, regardless of category. You can enter a combat with a random monster via /combat. There are no penalties for losing

fields.name: Health
fields.value: Decreases each turn based on the enemy's attack and your defense. When it reaches 0, you lose the combat

fields.name: Defense
fields.value: Reduces the amount of health you lose from each attack

title: Traveling Tutorial
description: You can travel to different locations using /map, which determines the interactions you can have.

fields.name: Shore, Lake, River
fields.value: Allows you to catch different types of fish

title: Prestige Tutorial
description: Prestiging is the ultimate goal of this bot. It resets all of your levels, clears your inventory, etc. In exchange, you get a prestige point that can be viewed on the second page of your profile. In order to prestige, you must have a global level of 100 and get 10 Rainbow Crystals. Have fun figuring out all of their sources!
